sections.heading: About
sections.content: GamerLog is a Django-based platform where players build a visual game library, rate & review titles, and get personalized recommendations powered by the Surprise library. From your profile, the Toss Me a Game button suggests smart picks based on what you've played and liked.

items: Personal collections: curate your library with covers, ratings, and notes.
Smart discoverability: recommendations from collaborative filtering on your activity.
Social-ready: future-friendly for sharing collections and exploring others' shelves.

sections.content:
Tech Stack
• Back-end: Django
• Front-end: HTML/CSS (Vanilla), Bootstrap 5
• Database: SQLite 3

sections.heading: Description
sections.content:
Brickable Bridge is a hyper-casual reflex-based stacking game made with Unity.

Your goal is placing the road parts with good timing. Unless cars will fall and you will lose. You need to build the bridge while cars are reaching the end.

Simple and fun!
(Made in 48 hours.)
